snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was among those who said they supported Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s relationship with a group that promotes his agenda on gambling and other issues.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg defends Gov Andrew M Cuomo's relationship with Committee to Save New York, private lobbying group known for promoting Cuomo's agenda; some government watchdog groups question the growing influence of special interest groups on national, state and even city politics.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was among those who said they supported Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s relationship with a group that promotes his agenda on gambling and other issues.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Defends Cuomo on His Ties to Lobbying Group
headline.main: Defense Offered for Cuomo on Ties to Lobbying Group
headline.print_headline: Defense Offered for Cuomo On Ties to Lobbying Group
